title: TLG Auto Owner Marco Gerace
description:
Marco Gerace is the second-generation owner of TLG Auto in North Hollywood, specializing in air-cooled Porsches. Also, Matt drove a Manual-Transmission Ferrari 430 Scuderia and the Acura RDX

Check out TLG Auto: https://tlgauto.com/ 

Watch this show on YouTube! https://youtu.be/jBBEYvZNhkg

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman 

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman
